name: User should not be able to do CRUD operations on Batch Module with invalid end point

steps.name: Given  Admin logs in with valid Username and password for Batch Module Negative
When  Admin send Post Login request for Batch Module Negative
Then  Admin should be able to get 200 in the response and generate Token for Batch Module Negative
Given  User sets "Update" with valid Url, invalid endpoint and valid request body.
Then  User receives 404 Not found status in Batch response
